p: The LMT was used to test the extract-drug interaction due to the robustness of the in vitro L3 motility test. The results of the inhibition of L3 migration using the combination of IVM and the IC 50 of OFIEOH are shown in Table 4. The results of the inhibition of L3 migration using the association of OFIEOH and the IC 50 of IVM are shown in Table 5.
